summary: In an Indian village, a struggling barber sees his luck begin to turn when residents learn that a famous actor he once knew is coming to town.
cast: Irrfan Khan|Lara Dutta|Om Puri|Asrani|Rajpal Yadav|Manoj Joshi|Jagadish|Rasika Joshi|Mitali Mayekar|Pratik Dalvi|Kareena Kapoor|Deepika Padukone|Shah Rukh Khan|Shankar Sachdev|Chirag Vohra|Atul Parchure|Vineet Kapoor|Sunil Bob|Nagesh Bhonsle|Vikash Srivastav|Pushkar Shotri|Amey Wagh|Rishikesh Sharma|Ahsan Bakhsh|Jayant Gadekar|Rajni Vaidya|Neeti Wagh|Lalit Parashar|Urmila Sharma|Rushi Mistry|Indra Mansukhani|Anil Kumar|Manoj Sharma|Ajay Shah|Kanchan Rawat|Rajgopal|Chander|Ashwini Bhatt|Stuti Rushi|Uday Atroliyer|Dinkar Gawande|Sushil Pande|Sushil Bonthiyal|Sushil Shukla|Basant Sinha|Anand Bapat|Paresh Brakmabhatt|Noor Ali|Naushad Lari|Dharmandra Patidar|Anu Aggarwal|Deepesh|Yaseen Khan|Saurabh Frenchmail|James|Hamid|Dilip|Paresh Bramhbhatt|Priyanka Chopra|Perin Malde|Prasoon Narayan|Pushkar Shrotri

title: Billu
